data.name: VZX Creative Visual Pack: Networks
data.detailed_description:
This pack contains 7 visuals.

The visuals are the following:
  • Cyber Dive: Dive into a stream of glowing circuit boards.
  • Spectrum Flight: Get a sense of flying above the sound waves.
  • Spectrum Pool: A multi colored wave pool.
  • Hyperspace Orb: Lightning storm in space.
  • Three Body: An art installation in space - 3 energy spheres exhanging energy.
  • Dream Pool: Space flowers dripping glowing nectar into a pool
  • Gem World: Glittering gemstones set in sphere formations floating around glimmering to the music.
data.about_the_game:
This pack contains 7 visuals.

The visuals are the following:
  • Cyber Dive: Dive into a stream of glowing circuit boards.
  • Spectrum Flight: Get a sense of flying above the sound waves.
  • Spectrum Pool: A multi colored wave pool.
  • Hyperspace Orb: Lightning storm in space.
  • Three Body: An art installation in space - 3 energy spheres exhanging energy.
  • Dream Pool: Space flowers dripping glowing nectar into a pool
  • Gem World: Glittering gemstones set in sphere formations floating around glimmering to the music.
data.short_description: 7 visuals for VZX Pro Player. Glittering gems, lightning and flying over the soundwaves.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Dual core 64-bit x86
  • Graphics: Nvidia or AMD OpenGL 4.6 GPU (intel HD graphics not supported!)
  • Storage: 70 MB available space
  • Sound Card: WASAPI-compatible soundcard
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Quad core 64-bit x86
  • Graphics: Nvidia or AMD OpenGL 4.6 GPU (intel HD graphics not supported!)
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: WASAPI-compatible soundcard
